KOLCHAK THE NIGHT STALKER (1974) Darren McGavin is Carl Kolchak

8. Bad Medicine    11/29/1974 
A series of apparent suicides among high-society matrons coincides with a bizarre jewel theft by a towering Indian who mysteriously disappears when cornered. Carl must learn who the tall Indian is, why he&#039;s stealing gems and slaying their owners - and how to stop him forever.

Writer: L. Ford Neale, John Huff
Director: Alexander Grasshoff
Guest star: Jack Grinnage (Ron Updyke), Ruth McDevitt (Emily Cowles) , David Lewis (Auctioneer (Belloy)), Richard Kiel (The Diablero), Alice Ghostley (Dr. Agnes Temple), Victor Jory (Charles Rolling Thunder), Ramon Bieri (Captain Joe Baker), Marvin Kaplan (Albert Delgado), James Griffith (George M.
